mapper.sql:
INSERT INTO EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ( ERNT_NO, EMPL_NO, EQPNM_CD, ERNT_QY, ERNT_RESN, PRMISN_YN, ERNT_BEGIN_DT, ERNT_END_DT,
RGSDE, RESOURCE_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{erntNo}, #{emplNo}, #{eqpnmCd}, #{erntQy}, #{erntResn}, 'PENDING', #{erntBeginDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{erntEndDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATE, #{resourceType} )
mapper.select:
SELECT ERNT_NO, EMPL_NO, EQPNM_CD, TO_CHAR(ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ERNT_BEGIN_DT, TO_CHAR(ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ERNT_END_DT, ERNT_RESN, ERNT_QY, RESOURCE_TYPE, PRMISN_YN FROM EQUIPMENT_RENTAL WHERE RESOURCE_TYPE IN ( 'vehicle', 'supplies') AND
(PRMISN_YN ='Y' OR PRMISN_YN='PENDING')

SELECT a.ERNT_NO, a.EQPNM_CD, a.ERNT_RESN, a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, a.ERNT_END_DT, a.ERNT_QY, a.PRMISN_YN, b.ITEM_NM, b.ITEM_CODE, a.rnum, e.EMPL_NO, e.EMPL_NM FROM ( SELECT ER.ERNT_NO, ER.EQPNM_CD, ER.ERNT_RESN, ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, ER.ERNT_END_DT, ER.EMPL_NO, ER.ERNT_QY, ER.PRMISN_YN, V.ITEM_NM, V.ITEM_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ER.ERNT_NO DESC) AS rnum FROM EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM V ON ER.EQPNM_CD = V.ITEM_CODE WHERE ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR V.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_QY LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ) a INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM b ON a.EQPNM_CD = b.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.EMPL_NO = e.EMPL_NO WHERE a.rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} AND a.PRMISN_YN = 'PENDING' AND e.EMPL_NO = #{emplNo} ORDER BY a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT DESC

select count(ERNT_NO) from EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM R ON ER.EQPNM_CD = R.ITEM_CODE where 1=1 and (ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR R.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%') and empl_no = #{emplNo} and PRMISN_YN = 'PENDING'

select count(ERNT_NO) from EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM R ON ER.EQPNM_CD = R.ITEM_CODE where 1=1 and (ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR R.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%') and PRMISN_YN = 'PENDING'

SELECT a.ERNT_NO, a.EQPNM_CD, a.ERNT_RESN, a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, a.ERNT_END_DT, a.ERNT_QY, a.PRMISN_YN, b.ITEM_NM, b.ITEM_CODE, a.rnum, e.EMPL_NO, e.EMPL_NM FROM ( SELECT ER.ERNT_NO, ER.EQPNM_CD, ER.ERNT_RESN, ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, ER.ERNT_END_DT, ER.EMPL_NO, ER.ERNT_QY, ER.PRMISN_YN, V.ITEM_NM, V.ITEM_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ER.ERNT_NO DESC) AS rnum FROM EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM V ON ER.EQPNM_CD = V.ITEM_CODE WHERE ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR V.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_QY LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ) a INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM b ON a.EQPNM_CD = b.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.EMPL_NO = e.EMPL_NO WHERE a.rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} AND a.PRMISN_YN = 'PENDING' ORDER BY a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT DESC

SELECT a.ERNT_NO, a.EQPNM_CD, a.ERNT_RESN, a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, a.ERNT_END_DT, a.ERNT_QY, a.PRMISN_YN, b.ITEM_NM, b.ITEM_CODE, a.rnum, e.EMPL_NO, e.EMPL_NM FROM ( SELECT ER.ERNT_NO, ER.EQPNM_CD, ER.ERNT_RESN, ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, ER.ERNT_END_DT, ER.EMPL_NO, ER.ERNT_QY, ER.PRMISN_YN, V.ITEM_NM, V.ITEM_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ER.ERNT_NO DESC) AS rnum FROM EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM V ON ER.EQPNM_CD = V.ITEM_CODE WHERE ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR V.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_QY LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ) a INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM b ON a.EQPNM_CD = b.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.EMPL_NO = e.EMPL_NO WHERE a.rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} AND e.EMPL_NO = #{emplNo} AND a.PRMISN_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT DESC

select count(ERNT_NO) from EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM R ON ER.EQPNM_CD = R.ITEM_CODE where 1=1 and (ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR R.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%') and empl_no = #{emplNo} and PRMISN_YN = 'Y'

select count(ERNT_NO) from EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM R ON ER.EQPNM_CD = R.ITEM_CODE where 1=1 and (ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR R.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%') and (PRMISN_YN = 'Y' or PRMISN_YN ='N')

SELECT a.ERNT_NO, a.EQPNM_CD, a.ERNT_RESN, a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, a.ERNT_END_DT, a.ERNT_QY, a.PRMISN_YN, b.ITEM_NM, b.ITEM_CODE, a.rnum, e.EMPL_NO, e.EMPL_NM FROM ( SELECT ER.ERNT_NO, ER.EQPNM_CD, ER.ERNT_RESN, ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, ER.ERNT_END_DT, ER.EMPL_NO, ER.ERNT_QY, ER.PRMISN_YN, V.ITEM_NM, V.ITEM_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ER.ERNT_NO DESC) AS rnum FROM EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM V ON ER.EQPNM_CD = V.ITEM_CODE WHERE ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR V.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_QY LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ) a INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM b ON a.EQPNM_CD = b.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.EMPL_NO = e.EMPL_NO WHERE a.rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} AND (a.PRMISN_YN = 'Y' or a.PRMISN_YN = 'N') ORDER BY a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE EQUIPMENT_RENTAL SET ERNT_RTURN_DT = SYSDATE, PRMISN_YN = 'RETURNED' WHERE ERNT_NO = #{erntNo}
mapper.select: select count(ERNT_NO) from EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM R ON ER.EQPNM_CD = R.ITEM_CODE where 1=1 and (ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR R.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%') and PRMISN_YN = 'RETURNED' and ERNT_RTURN_DT is not null

SELECT a.ERNT_NO, a.EQPNM_CD, a.ERNT_RESN, a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, a.ERNT_END_DT, a.ERNT_QY, TO_CHAR(a.ERNT_RTURN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ERNT_RTURN_DT,
a.PRMISN_YN, b.ITEM_NM, b.ITEM_CODE, a.rnum, e.EMPL_NO, e.EMPL_NM FROM ( SELECT ER.ERNT_NO, ER.EQPNM_CD, ER.ERNT_RESN, ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, ER.ERNT_END_DT, ER.EMPL_NO, ER.ERNT_QY, ER.ERNT_RTURN_DT, ER.PRMISN_YN, V.ITEM_NM, V.ITEM_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ER.ERNT_NO DESC) AS rnum FROM EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM V ON ER.EQPNM_CD = V.ITEM_CODE WHERE ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR V.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_QY LIKE '%' ||#{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' ||#{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' ||#{searchWord} || '%' ) a INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM b ON a.EQPNM_CD = b.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.EMPL_NO = e.EMPL_NO WHERE a.rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} AND a.PRMISN_YN = 'RETURNED' and a.ERNT_RTURN_DT is not null ORDER BY a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT DESC

SELECT a.ERNT_NO, a.EQPNM_CD, a.ERNT_RESN, a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, a.ERNT_END_DT, a.ERNT_QY, TO_CHAR(a.ERNT_RTURN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ERNT_RTURN_DT, a.PRMISN_YN, b.ITEM_NM, b.ITEM_CODE, a.rnum, e.EMPL_NO, e.EMPL_NM FROM ( SELECT ER.ERNT_NO, ER.EQPNM_CD, ER.ERNT_RESN, ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, ER.ERNT_END_DT, ER.EMPL_NO, ER.ERNT_QY, ER.ERNT_RTURN_DT, ER.PRMISN_YN, V.ITEM_NM, V.ITEM_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ER.ERNT_NO DESC) AS rnum FROM EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM V ON ER.EQPNM_CD = V.ITEM_CODE WHERE ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR V.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_QY LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ) a INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM b ON a.EQPNM_CD = b.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.EMPL_NO = e.EMPL_NO WHERE a.rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} AND e.EMPL_NO = #{emplNo} AND a.PRMISN_YN = 'RETURNED' ORDER BY a.ERNT_BEGIN_DT DESC

select count(ERNT_NO) from EQUIPMENT_RENTAL ER INNER JOIN RENT_ITEM R ON ER.EQPNM_CD = R.ITEM_CODE where 1=1 and (ER.ERNT_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR R.ITEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(ER.ERNT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR ER.ERNT_RESN LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%') and empl_no = #{emplNo} and PRMISN_YN = 'RETURNED'
SELECT item_nm, COUNT(item_nm) count FROM equipment_rental er LEFT OUTER JOIN rent_item r ON er.eqpnm_cd = item_code GROUP BY item_nm
